pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data from all Seasons of Survivor (US) TV Series in Tidy Format // Several datasets which detail the results and events of each season of Survivor. This includes details on the cast, voting history, immunity and reward challenges, jury votes and viewers. This data is useful for practicing data wrangling, graph analytics and analysing how each season of Survivor played out. Includes 'ggplot2' scales and colour palettes for visualisation.
